version_description: - General Performance and Stability Improvements!

+ New Cashback World design
+ Now you can rate your shopping experience
+ Quick registration is now available

+ "Tell a Friend" is now available
+ Cashback Card images are now available
General Performance and Stability Improvements

- Search is now faster
- Can search for deals and offers
- Offers are now displayed on dashboard
- General Performance and Stability Improvements
- General Performance and Stability Improvements

- General Performance and Stability Improvements
- Added Cashback World relevant components to improve the user experience

We improved the user experience while using the search module.
Also added some general improvements.
The start date of Super Deals is now correctly shown on the home tab

- Integration of FAQs into the Cashback App
- Theming is now available for not fully registered users.
- Necessary changes for iOS 11
- General performance and stability improvements

The user can refine his search by navigating to a desired search category and limiting his search results to that category.
General stability and performance improvements.

- Added payout information to "My Sales"

- General stability and performance improvements

- Redesigned the UI of the search function.
- It's now possible to add Cashback Cards via the app.
- Bug fixes and general improvements

-General improvements and minor bug fixes.
-General improvements

- You can now mark eVoucher Partner as favourite
- General performance improvements and minor bug fixes
Fixed a problem which prevents the device from getting valid location information when using the radius search.

- General improvements concerning eVoucher brand descriptions.
- Fixed minor UI glitches

- UI update for the bought eVoucher list
- General performance and stability improvements

- General performance and stability improvements
- Minor bugfixes

The start screen got a brand-new design!

- Stability improvements.
- Bugfix for devices which are running iOS 10

- Added "Recommended Partners" to the Dashboard
- General improvements and minor bug fixes

- Introducing the new "Personal Page"
- Adjustment of "Settings" and your personal information, these are available from nearly everywhere within the app
- General UI changes and improvements

- Introducing the new "Personal Page"
- Fixed an issue relating iOS 10 Devices
- Also resolved a problem relating the new "Settings" access
- Adaptations for iOS 13

- Design update for some parts of the app
- General performance improvements

- You can now inspect and edit your bank details within the app
- We fixed a problem the feature "shake to show your cashback cards". At some points within the app the cards were not shown correctly,
- Added "My eVouchers" to the quickmenu
- You are now able to start the discovery tour manually.

- Added a setting to control the "Shake for Cashback Card" feature
- Refinements and adaptations of some UI parts of the App
- General performance and stability improvements.

- Its now possible to search for eVoucher brands within the purchasing process.
- Fixed a problem while updating partners near you
- General stability and performance improvements

- Added the function "Arrange Callback" to the contact page
- Push Notifications got split up in categories, which can now be toggled directly in the settings of the Cashback App
- General stability and performance improvements

- Resolved a problem regarding iOS 10 devices
- General performance and stability improvements

- Fixed a problem concerning the Login
- General stability and performance improvements.
-General stability and performance improvements
- Fixed a problem that prevents the dashboard from being updated correctly after submitting a rating
We modified the way of how content is loaded on the dashboard and implemented general stability and performance improvements.
In order to improve finding partners near you we added some quickfilters to the map. Additionally we implemented general performance and stability improvements.
We have improved eVoucher purchase process with top up option. Along minor UI improvements there is also delivery info and delivery search filter for partners.
We fixed critical issue with user authorization.
We updated partner rating view so user can see partner response. Along minor evoucher topup UI improvements there is also new mVoucher balance item in user site.
We reworked the behavior of the welcome massages on the dashboard. Furthermore we fixed some minor bugs.

The public area of the app has now a new onboarding tab.
Now all the locations of a specific merchant are displayed on a map instead of a plain list. 
In addition to that we also made some improvements in various places.
We have improve eVoucher discount opportunities.
We made minor slider UI improvements.

- added a new type of voucher
- ui adjustments
- bug fixes
- general performance and stability improvements
- Bugfix: There was a problem in the startup process of the application

- "TravelWorld Products" are now available within the Cashback App.
- Some third-party apps could not correctly infer the type of a shared pdf file. We reworked the process so that this isn't a problem anymore.
- Furthermore we made some minor changes and improvements.

- "TravelWorld Products" are now available within the Cashback App.
- Some third-party apps could not correctly infer the type of a shared pdf file. We reworked the process so that this isn't a problem anymore.
- Fixed an ui bug for large devices

- General performance and stability improvements
- Bug fixes

- Deals can now be picked with benefit vouchers.
- The registration process has a new design.
- General performance and stability improvements

We have added a new feature:
- Partner landing page

We have also made minor UI improvements and adjustments.

We have added a new feature:
- Search Widget (iOS 14)

Additionally we made general performance and stability improvements.

- General UI updates
- Performance and stability improvements

Added new features:
- Benefit Lounge
- UI adjustments and performance improvements

- General performance and stability improvements
- Some bug fixes
We did a big UI redesign with a new white theme. We also improved and increased application stability.
Along minor UI improvements we have also implemented new font style and new dashboard banner.
We fixed a bug which prevents some partner information to be loaded correctly.
